data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Alborz, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Alborz, Iran
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Alborz, Iran to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Lord, to the people of Alborz you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Alborz, Iran to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Tati, Southern people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Alborz words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Alborz, Iran be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Alborz. Through your servants plant 542 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Alborz
location.cities_list: Karaj, Naz̧arābād, Shahre Jadide Andisheh, Malārd, Ābyek
